description: Spacer between right anchor and promoter removed so promoter abuts the looped enhancer block.
10Ã— HS2 array with convergent CTCF anchors at 350/450 kb; promoter at 500 kb.
Right CTCF anchor flipped to disrupt loop polarity while keeping enhancer position constant.
Enhancer block moved to 800 kb; anchors remain around an empty loop near the promoter.
